name: Maddie
note: A 14-year-old withdrawn, shy, and strong-willed high school girl. Maddie has an affinity for technology and was taught computer programming by her father. Smart and determined, Maddie displays a lot of bravery as she gets entangled in a large conspiracy.

name: David
note: Maddie's loving, altruistic father and a programming genius. Afflicted with a terminal illness at age 43, David agreed to Logorhythms's U.I. procedure to preserve his mind. With help from his family and Laurie, he was able to escape Logorhythms.

name: Caspian
note: A 17-year-old sullen yet kind teenager. A computer science genius, Caspian has unknowingly been raised as special Logorhythms operation for the purpose of being the "key" to Holstrom's U.I legacy.

name: Ellen
note: Maddie's protective and down-to-earth mother, and a college history professor.

name: Cary
note: Caspian's father and a secret agent of Logorhythms, having worked closely with Holstrom before his death. While he plays the role of an abusive husband, Cary genuinely cares for the boy and wants to protect him.

name: Pope
note: Current CEO of Logorhythms, who is seeking to realize the dreams of his best friend, Holstrom.

name: Chanda
note: A brilliant and humble engineer from Alliance Telecom who has interest in U.I. After being killed and forcefully uploaded as an U.I. by Prasad, Chanda was able to escape his cage and become the third rogue U.I.

name: Waxman
note: A Logorhythms employee and part of the Julius's inner circle. An old friend to David Kim, he was the one who recruited David to help them with their U.I. research.

name: Renee
note: Caspian's mother, a secret agent of Logorhythms, and Holstrom's former lover. While she acts as a timid and caring mother, Renee coldly sees her son as an assignment.

name: Laurie
note: A former 31-year-old investment manager on Wall Street. After a car crash three years prior left her in critical condition, she underwent Logorhythms's U.I. procedure and was then used for her marketing talent. Laurie is the first successful U.I. and became allies with Maddie and her family.

name: Cody
note: An artist and Laurie's husband. Despite previously being lied to by Logorhythms that Laurie's I.U. procedure was a failure, Cody eventually reunites with his wife and they work together with the Kim family.

name: Hannah
note: The fake girl friend of Caspian which is hired by Renee. Hannah is not the real name.

name: Gabe
note: Ellen's kind and gentle co-worker who became her boyfriend after David's death.

name: Samara
note: A popular girl at Berkshire Academy and the ringleader of Maddie's bullies.

name: Stephen Holstrom
note: The deceased founder of Logorhythms and a legendary genius billionaire. Although he died before perfecting uploaded intelligence, his loyal followers carry on his work.

name: Prasad
note: The corrupted CEO of Alliance Telecom, a rival company to Logorhythms, and Chanda's boss.

name: Justine
note: A blunt and somewhat apathetic student at Berkshire Academy that Maddie befriends.
